page.title: 02SUGGESTIONS FOR NEW ROMNEY
page.content: I THINK NEW ROMNEY IS A GOOD PLACE TO LIVE IT IS A FRIENDLY COMMUNITY.MOST HOUSES ARE PLACED JUST THE RIGHT DISTANCE FROM THE HIGH STREET.I DO THINK THERE SHOULD BE OAK TREES PLANTED SO THAT LATER GENERATIONS CAN SEE WHAT A LOVELY TOWN IT IS.I THINK THE SHOPS IN NEW ROMNEY ARE JUST RIGHT FOR THE COMMUNITY ALTHOUGH SOME ARE A LITTLE EXPENSIVE.HAVING TWO SUPERMARKETS IS A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE ONE IS ALWAYS TRYING TO BEAT THE OTHERS PRICES.I ALSO THINK THERE SHOULD BE MORE TELEPHONE BOXES AND MORE THAN ONE PUBLIC TOILET.THERE SHOULD BE MORE POLICE PATROLS TO PREVENT VANDALISM.WE HAVE ENOUGH HISTORY TO HAVE A BETTER MUSEUM,THERE IS ENOUGH ROOM AND IT WOULD ATTRACT TOURISTS.
